mapper.select: SELECT PRO_CATEGORY, COUNT(*) PRO_COUNT FROM PRODUCT GROUP BY PRO_CATEGORY ORDER BY PRO_COUNT DESC

SELECT PRO_NO , PRO_NAME , TO_CHAR(PRO_PRICE, '999,999,999') PRO_PRICE , PRO_DCOMPANY , TO_CHAR(PRO_DCOST, '999,999,999') PRO_DCOST , PRO_QUANTITY , PRO_CONDITION , PRO_CONTENT , USER_ID , PRO_FILENAME , PRO_CATEGORY FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRO_NO = #{pro_no}
